name: Beat Sketcher
description:
Download Beat Sketcher™ a fun and intuitive musical drawing experience for the PlayStation®Move motion controller.
Beat Sketcher™ lets you create your own masterpiece and sketch colorful artwork with steady accuracy and flowing expression. Draw to the music using a wide variety of paint brushes, brush tips, and musical instruments. Learn to draw in a fun and challenging way by copying brush strokes in Challenge mode or test your artistic flair with or against your friends in a variety of fun cooperative or competitive modes. You can also draw whatever you want in Creation Mode and upload your work of art for all to see!
Unleash your Imagination with Beat Sketcher™!
